name: convert_planet_angle_to_planet_degree
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool yawin_indian_astrology.
Tool description: Indian astrology API for planet positions, ascension calculations, and prediction findings, Basic tools that help in astrological calculations
API description: Convert a Planet Angle to  Degree Format . (Angle is 67.34.0, converted to Degree as 67.5666666667)

angle.description: The planet angle string to be converted (e.g., '67.34.0').
